titleStmt.title: The humble representation of his late Majesties and Princes domestick servants signifying their distressed condition, and necessitated designment for relief.
titleStmt.author: Utie, Emmanuel, d. 1661.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copies: [Thomason 669.f.19[75], c.1] "Aprill. 27. 1655."; [Thomason 669.f.19[75], c.2 "Aprill 26. [written over to read "27."] 1655".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
